o = None
-----
None
=====
o = None is None
-----
True
=====
o = None is not None
-----
False
=====
o = None == None
-----
True
=====
o = None != None
-----
False
=====
o = None is 5
-----
False
=====
o = None is not 5
-----
True
=====
o = None == 5
-----
False
=====
o = None != 5
-----
True
=====
o = None is const(1)
-----
?*stream.StreamIsNone is not stringable
